wlv.mt.tools
Class POSProcessor

java.lang.Object
  wlv.mt.tools.POSProcessor

public class POSProcessor
extends java.lang.Object

The POSProcessor class analyses a file produced by a pos tagger and sets certain values to a Sentence object These values are, currently, the number of nouns, verbs, pronouns and content words

Field Summary
(package private)  java.io.BufferedReader br
           
(package private)  int sentCount
           
 
Constructor Summary
POSProcessor(java.lang.String input)
          initialise a POSProcessor from an input file The POSProcessor expect an input file in a fixed format, where each line is of the type:
word DT word (tokens separated by tab)
 
Method Summary
 void processSentence(Sentence sent)
          Reads the pos tags associated to a sentence and counts the number of content words The count for each type of content word is addedd as a value to the sentence @see Sentence.setValue()
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

public POSProcessor(java.lang.String input)
initialise a POSProcessor from an input file The POSProcessor expect an input file in a fixed format, where each line is of the type:

Method Detail

processSentence

public void processSentence(Sentence sent)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
Reads the pos tags associated to a sentence and counts the number of content words The count for each type of content word is addedd as a value to the sentence @see Sentence.setValue()

Parameters:
sent - the sentence to be analysed
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
